attributes.action: ensure that Zimbabwe is not allowed to take part in the 2012 Olympic Games in London by banning any Zimbabwean official or sportsman representing Zimbabwe from entry into the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mugabe runs a disgusting, corrupt and oppressive regime and recognition through allowing participation in the Olympic Games due to take place in this country in 2012 will indicate that the people of this country support Mugabe and that cannot be allowed.
